title: Charades mens Wing Man
features: Adult wingman costume flight jumpsuit with fabric belt and patches
Important: costumes are sized differently than apparel, use the Charades adult men's size chart, do not choose based on clothing size
Charades offers a wide range of movie inspired costumes and accessories for men, women, and children
From inspiration, through design and construction, Charades takes pride in quality materials and excellent finished products
description: Whether you're a hotshot maverick or as cool as an iceman, this fighter pilot costume jumpsuit with belt and patches will take their breath away. Designed for adults, perfect for photos, parties, dress-up all year long and great for Halloween too! from inspiration, through design and construction, Charades takes pride in quality materials and excellent finished products.
